ai-patthana16.88:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.88:0.3_0: Sensual pleasures are like an enemy in the territory.
ai-patthana16.88:1.1_0: Not inappropriately for the sake of sensual pleasures, they don’t give rise to unsullied ones, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.88:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.88:2.1_0: Not inappropriately for doing this, they don’t give rise to the following things. ...
ai-patthana16.88:2.1_1: Not doing so, they don’t give rise to the shackle of rebirth, old age, and death.
